scripts.desktop:build:linux: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles appimage,deb,rpm
scripts.desktop:build:win: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles nsis,msi
scripts.desktop:build:mac: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles dmg
scripts.desktop:build:deb: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles deb
scripts.desktop:build:rpm: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles rpm
scripts.desktop:build:appimage: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles appimage
scripts.desktop:build:nsis: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles nsis
scripts.desktop:build:msi: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles msi
scripts.desktop:build:dmg: bun run --cwd apps/desktop tauri build --bundles dmg
scripts.desktop:install:deb: bash -c 'DEB=$(ls -t apps/desktop/src-tauri/target/release/bundle/deb/*.deb 2>/dev/null | head -1) && [ -n "$DEB" ] && sudo dpkg -i "$DEB" || echo "No .deb found. Run desktop:build:deb first."'
scripts.desktop:uninstall: bash -c 'if dpkg -l | grep -q dora; then sudo apt-get remove -y dora; else echo "Dora is not installed."; fi'
